Nothing beats the feeling of trying to spray with ak47 but being so bad that you accidentally 1-tap them. 10/10 best shooter
Tactical 5v5 fast paced  shooter. To win, it requires a steady hand, ears like a jackal, and the wit of a fox. Teamwork is everything, without them, you cannot win.

In my 500 hours of gameplay now i can say Im above average in the game i feel that Im gold nova level skill but Im silver 1 and i have been for 450 hours of gameplay. This is a hole i can't ever ever climb out of its been that way for ever. I was silver 2 for 5 hours but got put back in sliver one instantly. There is so much i can do and with me not even knowing if im close to ranking up or down or staying the same, it has made me lose my drive for the game. Atleast i got my Valorant key please be better than cs please Riot.
